title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 980.12 - Counties acting jointly or cooperatively
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 980.12 - Counties acting jointly or cooperatively

State Regulations

In the event two or more counties desire to jointly or
cooperatively develop coordinated public transportation services or a single
coordinated service, each rural county shall be entitled to apply for financial
assistance under this Part to the same extent and in the same manner as any
other rural county. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
980.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
